title: Escape the Nautiloid
tags: find a way off the nautiloid
content:
tial Companion, tells you to get her out of there, Lae'zel insists that we leave her as we don't have much time.

From here, you will have 5 dialogue options:

Look for a latch that might open the lid. There's no time - I need to get out of here. I'll go look around - there must be some way to get this thing open. [WARLOCK] [ARCANA] There's magic at work here. Determine what kind. Leave.

Depending on your character, choosing the fourth option will require you to pass a skill check with DC 7, su
